name: Goobi Demo V2
description:
Demo V2 is here!

This is to showcase and test out the movement and main mechanic of Goobi! Mess around in the demo level and let me know what you think! 

I hope you all enjoy it!

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

1. Extract files

2. Open "Windows No Editor"

3. Open "Goobi Demo"

4. Play!
